title: 悲剧阿！   正版突然不能用了！  怎么回事 来看看
author: a61793962a
txt_content:
收到 MoJang 邮件 说 
The purchase that gave you access to Minecraft has been reversed upon request. This means that you no longer will be able to play the game.
If you believe that this reversal has been made in error, or have any other questions please contact customer support.Take care,
Mojang.

replies.txt_content:
673696351 发表于 2013-11-19 21:15 
你买黑卡了
如果你在别的地方买的价格低于官方，基本就是买黑key了，你只有重新买一个同样账号的正版才能恢复
